info.brief_description: You or Bond are shrunk and are at the midst of any Bond Girl You Want. PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You can be an original characters in the bond world or you can be James Bond. You be with any Bond girl in any era you like.

RULES:
1). Once You Choose An Era Keep It That Era
2). Keep It Unaware (If Found
3). No Deaths
4). Keep It Female Focus (Unless Bond Decides To Sleep With Them But That’s It)
5). Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
6). Describe What The Arw Wearing (Or Use Images)
